abstract: Canadian Prime Min Justin Trudeau outlines his liberal legislative agenda, which includes tax cuts and pension improvements for middle class and efforts to legalize marijuana and revamp how Canadians elect the House of Commons.
lead_paragraph: In an address to Parliament, he promised to push for the legalization of marijuana, middle-class tax cuts and a revamping of how Canadians elect the House of Commons.

headline.main: Justin Trudeau Outlines Sweeping Agenda for Canada
headline.print_headline: Trudeau Outlines His Sweeping Agenda in Address

snippet: In an address to Parliament, he promised to push for the legalization of marijuana, middle-class tax cuts and a revamping of how Canadians elect the House of Commons.
